title: Update API endpoints for schema breaking change
description: Breaking Change: Articles now use categoryId/authorId (integer FKs) instead of categorySlug/authorSlug. API endpoints will need updates to match the new Drizzle schema.

title: Migrate existing data to new schema
description: NOT NEEDED - Dev mode, fresh start.

title: Update db.ts with new Drizzle queries
description: Align database operations in src/lib/db.ts with new schema. Update all queries to use categoryId/authorId instead of slug-based foreign keys. Add queries for new cached fields.

title: Add equipment CRUD API
description: Create new /api/equipment endpoint for the centralized equipment table. Support create, read, update, delete operations with affiliate link management.

title: Implement cache rebuild functions
description: Create helper functions for rebuilding cached fields: cached_author_json, cached_category_json, cached_equipment_json, cached_toc_json, cached_recipe_json, faqs_json, jsonld_json. These should run on article save.

title: Update admin article editor
description: Modify admin article editor component to handle new cached fields, equipment selection from centralized table, and proper category/author ID selection instead of slugs.

title: Test FTS5 search with new columns
description: Verify FTS5 full-text search works correctly with new columns: tag_labels, author_name, category_name. Test search queries and soft-delete filtering.

title: Apply schema.sql to D1 database
description: Run wrangler d1 execute to apply schema-drizzle/schema.sql to the D1 database. Drop existing tables first if needed (fresh start).

title: Test admin panel with new schema
description: Verify admin panel works correctly with new database schema. Test CRUD operations for categories, authors, tags, articles.

title: Seed initial test data
description: Create seed data script to populate fresh database with test categories, authors, tags, and sample articles for development.

title: Add equipment admin page
description: Create admin UI for managing equipment table: list, create, edit, delete kitchen equipment with affiliate links.

title: Build Advanced Analytics Dashboard in Admin
Apply schema.sql to D1 database
description: Run wrangler d1 execute to apply schema-drizzle/schema.sql to the D1 database. Drop existing tables first if needed (fresh start).

title: Build Advanced Analytics Dashboard in Admin
